Content: For degree-seeking or double-diploma students, it is mandatory to follow all your prescribed classes. Exchange students, on the other hand, are allowed to unregister from certain classes if they provide an explicit and written approval from their sending institution.

Title: Can I drop some classes?
Content: Only exchange students are allowed to drop classes if they have the authorization from their sending institution. At the beggining of the semester, you will be expected to communicate the courses you wish to drop and send us a written and explicit confirmation from you sending institution at our email address : incoming@devinci.fr. Only the requests that respect our deadline will be taken into account.

Title: When will I receive my grades?
Content: Once ready, your grades will be updated on your student portal.

Title: What is the procedure if I need a 30% additional time?
Content: You have to discuss with the department's disability advisor and provide the necessary medical documents.

Title: Is there a deadline to declare my need of additional time?
Content: You can declare it at the beginning of each semester.

Title: Can an internship start before the internship period ?
Content: Your internship can't begin on the date indicated in your calendar. The only exception at ESILV : A5 students in semester 9 abroad can start their internship at the end of their semester. At EMLV, this exception extends to the 3rd year abroad internship when the first semester of the 3rd year is an exchange semester. The same explanation applies the other way round: the Ministry of Higher Education prohibits internships outside periods identified as such in the academic calendar. This does not apply when your academic year takes place abroad (an exchange semester and an internship semester), as local regulations apply.

Title: What is the deadline to complete my internship?
Content: Depending on your year, a maximum and minimum duration are indicated in your calendar. Legally, an internship cannot exceed 6 months. If you started your end-of-studies internship late, subject to re-registration, you may complete it after August 31, without exceeding the deadline for preparing and sitting on the diploma jury (please contact your school: scolarité-emlv@devinci.fr or scoalrite-esilv@devinci.fr).

Title: What are the expectations at the end of the internship?
Content: For the A2 compulsory internship, you must submit an internship report, plus complete a defense for the mandatory internships in A4 and A5.

Title: I am at the end of my course (S11 / A6), what should I do to prepare for the internship defense?
Content: You must contact your school tutor (on the portal, internship section) and organise a remote defense between the two of you.

Title: Are CDD (fixed term contract) / CDI (permanent contract) / VIE (international company volunteering) accepted?
Content: The CDD/CDI (fixed-term / permanent contracts) and VIE are a possible alternative to internship agreements, subject to the acceptance of your assignments by your major supervisor/year advisor, and subject to the company's agreement to evaluate you and assign you a tutor within the company to supervise your work.

Title: Where can I find VIE offers?
Content: The main website is https://mon-vie-via.businessfrance.fr/offres. You can find them at https://www.pole-emploi.fr/international/mobilite-internationale.html as well as on corporate career sites.

Title: My agreement is signed, how can I modify it?
Content: In this case, initiate a request via the internship platform and the comment tab. Please note that each modification request will trigger the edition of a rider and will require once again the signature of all three parties: student, company and school.

Title: My agreement is not signed by all three parties, how can I change it?
Content: You must (you or the company) refuse the signature so that we can proceed to the requested modifications. Please specify all the changes you wish to make in the comment section.

Title: What is the minimum gratification for an internship lasting more than 2 months?
Content: As of January 1, 2023, the legal minimum gratification is 4,05 euros per hour.

Title: What is the minimum gratification for an internship lasting less than 2 months?
Content: There is no legal minimum for an internship of less than 2 month.

Title: Is the internship compulsory in the first year?
Content: The internship is optional for first year students, however it can be an opportunity to familiarise yourself with the business world (ESILV). The internship is compulsory for first year students (EMLV).

Title: Can I do an internship abroad?
Content: Yes, in this case an agreement is required, but the law of the country will apply to the terms of the internship.

Title: Can I do a full remote internship?
Content: Full company immersion with regular support from a tutor is necessary.

Title: What should I do in case of absences?
Content: In case of absence you must inform the company and the school.

Title: What happens if I don't find an internship?
Content: The school provides several means (forum, soft skills courses, offers,...). If you encounter some difficulties, you should contact your major/specialization supervisor and the career center. Eventually, if your search is unsuccessful, you will have to re-enrol at the end of your course to complete the necessary duration of the internship in a company.

Title: Can I start my internship without the signed agreement?
Content: Legally, it is forbidden to start an internship without the agreement being signed beforehand by all three parties. This puts you (and the company) in an untenable situation in the event of an accident at work (or on the way to work).

Title: Can I obtain several internship agreements during the same academic year?
Content: Only one agreement is issued per student per year, except in the case of a gap year when it is possible to obtain two.

Title: Who validates the assignments of my internship?
Content: Your major/specialization supervisor or year supervisor.

Title: What is the procedure in order to obtain an agreement?
Content: You will find the agreement application form on your platform.

Title: My company wishes to publish its own internship agreement, is this possible?
Content: If your company does not accept the school's agreement, it can issue its own. Please do not forget to mention this beforehand when entering your application.

Title: Which documents are required for an internship abroad?
Content: Before your internship abroad, you must provide the school with a certificate of civil liability and repatriation insurance with your name and surname covering the duration of the internship.

Title: How long does it take to get my agreement?
Content: In general, it takes one week to process a complete application. Take this information into account when determining your starting date with the company.

Title: What is the procedure if I wish to terminate my internship?
Content: The agreements are tripartite contracts. The student must discuss this beforehand with his/her major / specialization supervisor and see how to arrange the situation. If no arrangement is found, the company must confirm its agreement to leave by email, sent directly to the school scolarite-emlv@devinci.fr or scolarite-esilv@devinci.fr

Title: I'm repeating a year and I've already validated my internship. Do I have to do it again if I'm repeating a year?
Content: This is specified by the grading jury at the end of the academic year.. The answer may vary from course.

Title: In 3rd year, can I do the exchange and internship in the same country?
Content: Yes, it's possible. The exchange semester that generally precedes the internship semester can be an opportunity to prospect locally.

Title: Where can I find a list of countries that are unsafe for internships?
Content: The reference site: https://www.diplomatie.gouv.fr/fr/conseils-aux-voyageurs/conseils-par-pays-destination/. Please note that the school will not validate an internship in an unfavorable destination.

Title: What is the "attestation de reponsabilité civile" (certificate of civil liability)?
Content: A certificate of personal civil liability provides proof to an organisation that the person they are going to host is covered in case of damage to a third party. In general, the civil liability certificate that you are asked to provide is attached to your home insurance. It must be in your first and last name and cover the period of your internship.

Content: Please contact your school supervisor, the nurse and/or psychological helpline. You can also report the fact directly on www.leonarddevinci.signalement.net

Content: Food areas with microwaves and vending machines are available to students on all our campus

Title: I am a high-level athlete, what are my adjustments?
Content: Please contact Céline Graet : celine.graet@devinci.fr

Title: Do you need tutoring? Where can you find it?
Content: Leo Learning, the solidarity tutoring association, organizes individual support courses and weeks of collective revisions before the exams. Registration on the leolearning.fr platform with LeoID identifiers.

Title: How to join a student association?
Content: The contacts the 60 student associations boards are listed on the Student Life website on the portal. Title: How to create a student association?
Content: Make sure it doesn't already exist. And inform the Student life of the creation project by email: vie.associative@devinci.fr

Title: Is there a buddy system?
Content: Each school club set up a sponsorship system at the start of the year to facilitate the integration of new students. Links : venivididevinci@devinci.fr ; iimpact@devinci.fr ; vincisquad@devinci.fr

Title: Quelles sont les horaires et jours d'ouverture de la salle de sport ?
Content: Tous les jours exceptés les jeudis, les jours fériés, le week-end et pendant les vacances scolaires. 12h15 - 14h00 et 17h30 - 19h15

Title: Defining Soft Skills
Content: These are human skills and personal qualities, linked, for example, to our way of thinking and understanding the world, our emotions and our relationships with others, as well as our modes of action and decision-making. Soft skills' are valued in the professional world as a complement to 'hard skills', i.e. scientific and technical knowledge and know-how. The aim is to offer EMLV, ESILV and IIM students an additional criterion for differentiation from other candidates with the same technical profile.

Title: Qu’est-ce qu’un référent VSS ?
Content: Au pôle, il existe des référents VSS, membres du personnel dont la mission est de faire de la prévention et d’accompagner les étudiants victimes ou témoins de violences sexistes et sexuelles, et des correspondants VSS dans chaque cursus. Au sein des associations, il existe également des référents VSS associatifs formés pour participer aux actions de prévention.

Title: What is a VSS (SGBV) referent?
Content: At De Vinci Higher Education, there are VSS referents, members of staff whose mission is to prevent and support students who are victims or witnesses of sexual and gender-based violence, and VSS correspondents in each curriculum. Within the associations, there are also VSS referents trained to take part in prevention actions.

Title: Comment savoir si je suis victime de VSS ou témoin d’abus ?
Content: Le document intitulé « Lutte contre les violences sexistes et sexuelles, prévention et procédure de signalement » disponible sur le portail vous permet de connaître les différents abus.

Title: How do I know if I'm a victim or witness of abuse?
Content: The document entitled "Lutte contre les violences sexistes et sexuelles, prévention et procédure de signalement" ("Fighting against sexual and gender-based violence, prevention and reporting procedures") available on the portal helps you find out about the various types of abuse.

Title: J’ai fait un signalement de violences sexistes et sexuelles, que se passe-t-il après ?
Content: Vous recevrez un message des référents VSS pour organiser une rencontre. Si les faits se sont produits en milieu étudiant, les référents VSS se rapprocheront des correspondants VSS du cursus pour évaluer la situation et la soumettre à une cellule de décision. Les membres de la cellule de décision prendront les mesures nécessaires. Si les faits se sont produits en milieu professionnel, le pôle ne pourra pas intervenir, il faudra vous rapprocher de votre employeur.

Title: I've reported sexual and gender-based violence, what happens next?
Content: You will receive a message from the VSS referents to arrange a meeting. If the incident occurred in a student environment, the VSS referents will contact the curriculum’s VSS correspondent to assess the situation and submit it to a decision-making committee. The members of the decision-making committee will take the necessary measures. If the incident occurred in the workplace, De Vinci Higher Education will not be able to intervene ; you will need to contact your employer.

Title: Quelle est la durée hebdomadaire d’un stage en France ?
Content: "Durée hebdomadaire" signifie durée sur la semaine (en général 35 heures hors pause déjeuner, durée légale en France)

Title: What is the weekly duration of an internship in France?
Content: "Durée hebdomadaire" means duration over the week (generally 35 hours without lunch break, legal duration in France).

Title: Puis-je valider un stage A4 effectué en S11 par un CDI ?
Content: Si vous n'avez pas encore effectué votre stage de A4, vous devrez le réaliser après votre stage de fin d'études (en S11).  Désormais, vous ne pouvez plus remplacer ce stage A4 par un CDI après le stage A5 (c’était une exception liée à la période covid).

Title: Can I validate an A4 internship completed in S11 with a permanent contract (CDI)?
Content: If you have not yet done your 4th year internship, you will have to do it after your end-of-study internship (in S11). You can no longer replace this internship with a permanent contract after your A5 internship. It was an exception during covid.

Title: Quelle est la durée maximale pour un stage en France ?
Content: Un stage en France ne peut dépasser 6 mois (droit du travail)

Title: What is the maximum length of an internship in France?
Content: An internship in France cannot exceed 6 months (it’s the French law).

Title: L’entreprise souhaite une charte de confidentialité, quelle est la procédure ?
Content: Si l’entreprise souhaite mettre en place une charte de confidentialité ou équivalent, elle la transmet à l’étudiant stagiaire qui se chargera de la faire signer par l’école (en général, c’est le tuteur école qui doit signer, pas la direction).

Title: The company would like a confidentiality policy. What is the procedure?
Content: If the company wishes to set up a confidentiality policy or equivalent, it sends it to the student who will be responsible to have it signed by the school (usually, the school tutor must sign, not the management).

Title: Je suis en double-diplôme, dois-je saisir ma convention sur le portail ?
Content: Pour les double-diplômes, même si le stage est compris dans le cursus de l'université partenaire, vous devez compléter le formulaire sur la webapps en indiquant "convention fournie par l'organisme/l’unviersité partenaire ».

Title: I'm doing a double degree. Do I need to enter my agreement on the portal?
Content: For double degrees, even if the internship is included in the course of the partner university, you must complete the form on webapps/portal, indicating "agreement provided by the partner/university organization“.

Title: Un stage à l’international peut-il valider la période de mobilité obligatoire ?
Content: Un stage à l’international peut valider la période de mobilité obligatoire sous réserve qu’il dure 17 semaines à minima (recommandé 20 semaines).

Title: Can an international internship count towards the compulsory mobility period?
Content: An international internship can count towards the compulsory mobility period, provided that it lasts at least 17 weeks (recommended 20 weeks).

Title: Quelle est la procédure en cas  changement de tuteur entreprise?
Content: Vous devez contacter alterance-esilv@devinci.fr

Title: What procedure should I follow if my company tutor changes?
Content: You must contact alternance-esilv@devinci.fr

Title: Quelle est la procédure pour rompre un contrat d'alternance après la période d'essai?
Content: Dans un premier temps, avant toute initiative de rupture, vous devez impérativement en informer alternance-esilv@devinci.fr et votre tuteur école.

Title: What is the procedure for terminating a work-study contract after the trial period?
Content: First of all, before taking any initiative to break off your contract, you must inform alternance-esilv@devinci.fr and your school tutor.

Title: Quelle est la procédure pour rompre un contrat d'alternance pendant la période d'essai?
Content: Vous devez adresser le formulaire de rupture au CFA et à l'adresse alternance-esilv@devinci.fr

Title: What is the procedure for terminating a work-study contract during the trial period?
Content: You must send the termination form to the CFA and at alternance-esilv@devinci.fr.

Title: Quelle est la durée minimum de l'expérience internationale dans le cadre de l'aternance?
Content: La durée minimale est de 9 semaines pour valider l'expérience à l'international dans le cadre de l'alternance.

Title: What is the minimum length of the international experience required as part of an apprenticeship?
Content: The minimum duration is 9 weeks to validate the international experience in the context of work-study programs.

Title: Dans le cadre de l'entreprise, le fait d'échanger quotidiennement avec des équipes à l'étranger valide t-il l'expérience international?
Content: Non, l'expérience internationale ne se limite pas à la pratique de la langue.

Title: In the company context, does the fact of exchanging daily with teams from other countries validate the international experience?
Content: No, international experience isn't limited to language practice.

Title: Comment puis-je me procurer une convocation aux examens pour poser des jours de révisions?
Content: Vous devez en faire la demande à alternance-esilv@devinci.fr

Title: How can I obtain an exam convocation so that I can schedule revision days?
Content: Please send your request to alternance-esilv@devinci.fr

Title: Comment obtenir l'aide financière au permis de conduire?
Content: Vous devez contacter le CFA cfa-ilv@devinci.fr

Title: How can I apply for financial assistance for my driver's license?
Content: You must contact the CFA at cfa-ilv@devinci.fr

Title: Comment obtenir l'aide financière à la mobilité internationale?
Content: Vous devez contacter le CFA cfa-ilv@devinci.fr

Title: How can I apply for financial assistance for international mobility?
Content: You must contact the CFA at cfa-ilv@devinci.fr

Title: Mon livret d'apprentissage n'est pas complet, que dois-je faire?
Content: Vous êtes garant du suivi et de la complétude de votre livret. N’hésitez à pas relancer vos tuteurs pour cela. Vous devez vous assurez que votre maitre d'apprentissage a bien accès au portail (en début d'année un mail lui a été envoyé). Vous devez coordonner les échanges etre votre tuteur école et votre maitre d'apprentissage. Vous devez vous assurer que chaque étape est signée par tous les partis (coche bleu) En cas de soucis contacter : - ESILV : alternance-esilv@devincifr Rappel, des ects sont attribués à votre livret et donc l'obtention de votre diplôme.

Title: My apprenticeship booklet is incomplete. What should I do?
Content: You are in charge of the follow up of your booklet and its completion. Don't hesitate to remind your tutors.

Title: Mon tuteur école ne répond pas à mes sollicitations, que dois-je faire?
Content: Vous devez en informer alterance-esilv@devinci.fr

Title: My school tutor doesn't respond to my enquiries. What should I do?
Content: You must notify alternance-esilv@devinci.fr

Title: Où puis-je trouver ma convention de mobilité?
Content: Vous trouverez votre convention de mobilité sur votre portail dans l'onglet "Scolarité" puis "Documents", catégorie "Apprentissage"

Title: Where can I find my mobility agreement?
Content: You can find your mobility agreement on your student portal in the "School" tab, "Documents" category, then "Apprentissage/apprenticeship"

Title: Comment l'évaluateur est informé du rendu d'un devoir ?
Content: Dans DVL, les évaluateurs sont automatiquement informés des rendus de devoirs via les notifications du système. Vous n'avez pas besoin de les informer manuellement.

Title: How is the assessor informed when an assignment is due?
Content: In Moodle, assessors are automatically informed of assignments via system notifications. You don't need to inform them manually.

Title: En cycle master, un CDI peut-il valider un stage?
Content: Non, en cycle master, les CDI ne sont pas autorisés.

Title: As a Postgraduate student, is it possible to be hired on a permanent contract?
Content: Permanent contracts are not allowed.

Title: En cycle master, est-il possible d'obtenir plusieurs conventions de stage au cours de la même année scolaire?
Content: Non, a l’exception des césures, une seule convention de stage peut être délivrée par année scolaire.

Title: As a Postgraduate student, is it possible to work as an intern several times within the same academic year?
Content: Only one contract can be signed per academic year, unless you are enrolled in a gap year.

Title: Quelle est la durée minimum requise d'un stage validant l'expérience international?
Content: Afin que le stage valide l'international il doit durer 17 semaines.

Title: What is the minimum requirement to fulfil a semester abroad as an intern?
Content: A semester abroad must last 17 weeks.

Title: En cycle master, comment le stage est-il évalué?
Content: Pour que le stage soit validé, trois notes sont nécessaires: •soutenance •rapport de stage •évalaution entreprise Si une des trois notes est inférieure à 6 ou si la moyenne des trois est inférieure à 10, le stage est invalidé. Dans ce cas, vous devrez rélaisé un nouveau satge en semestre supplémentaire (S11).

Title: As a Postgraduate student, how am I being assessed during my internship?
Content: As a trainee, you will be assessed three times: - by your mentor in the workplace through an evaluation form - by your school tutor regarding your writing and academic skills displayed in your dissertation - by your school tutor regarding your speaking skills showcased during a dissertation defense If one of these three items is worth less than 6/20, or if the overall grade is worth less than 10/20, then the internship semester will be "failed". In this case, the student will have to work as an intern during an additional semester (S11).

Title: Comment sont répartis les crédits pour le stage d'année 5?
Content: Désormais, en A5, il y a une partie approfondissement scientifique qui compte pour 8 ects. Le sujet est à définir en début du stage en accord avec le tuteur école et les livrables sont contenus dans le rapport.

Title: How many ECTS is Year 5 worth?
Content: From now on, Year 5 students must write a dissertation chapter displaying a state of the art worth 8 ECTS. The topic must be discussed at the beginning of the internship with your academic tutor, and the results must be included in the dissertation.

Title: Est-il possible d'effectuer les deux stages de master en structure de recherche?
Content: Oui, mais attention, si vos deux stages de master sont effectués en structure de recherche, vous devez effectuer 14 semaines supplémentaires en entreprise à la fin de votre cursus (sauf si vous avez déjà effectué 14 semaines pour votre stage A2/A3),

Title: Is it possible to work as a  intern in a  research department twice during my academic journey?
Content: If two of your Postgraduate internships are tied to a research department, then you must work an additional 14 weeks in a business environment at the end of your last academic year. If you have already worked for 14 weeks as a trainee in a busines environment during your undergraduate years, then this will not be necessary.

Title: Quelles sont les conditions pour effectuer une mobilité internationale?
Content: •La mobilité internationale doit s'effectuer dans un pays sécurisé (couleur vert et jaune clair dans France diplomatie) •Elle doit être réalisée dans une période entreprise •Les missions doivent être en lien avec votre formation •La convention doit être signée par tous les partis avant votre départ •L'ensemble des conventions est disponible sur la plateforme dans la partie dédiée aux documents. •La durée peut être de 9 semaines minimum cumulables

Title: What are the conditions for participating in an international mobility program?
Content: The international mobility must take place in a secure country (indicated as green or light yellow on France Diplomatie). • It must be carried out during a company period. • The tasks must be related to your course of study. • The agreement must be signed by all parties before your departure. • All agreements are available on the platform in the section dedicated to documents. • The minimum duration of the mobility is 9 weeks, and the weeks can be accumulated.

Title: Que dois-je faire en cas d'oubli d'émargement?
Content: Seul un mail de votre enseignant attestant votre présence pourra justifier votre absence. Dans ce cas, vous devrez le déposer sur la plateforme dans l'espace dédié aux absence.

Title: What should I do in case of forgetting to sign the attendance sheet?
Content: Only an email from your teacher confirming your presence will justify your absence. In this case, you must upload the email to the platform in the section dedicated to absences

Title: My learning log is not complete; what should I do?
Content: You are responsible for monitoring and ensuring the completion of your learning log. Do not hesitate to follow up with your tutors for this matter. You must ensure that your apprenticeship supervisor has access to the portal (an email was sent to them at the beginning of the year). You need to coordinate the exchanges between your school tutor and your apprenticeship supervisor. It is essential that each step is signed by all parties (blue check). In case of issues, contact alternance-esilv@devinci.fr. Reminder: ECTS credits are assigned to your learning log, which is required for obtaining your diploma.
